review: I can only tell you one thing; you will not regret the purchase of this Amazon item! It's easy to install and activate and you're off to the races (movies.) I DO NOT know how they can produce technology this good for such a reasonable price. P.S. I love my Echo, too!
author: todrox "todrox"

review: It response time less then Roku, works very good with Sling TV, ESPN and YouTube.
author: virag

review: Love these.  Very easy set up and also easy to use.
author: Cheryl Collier

review: Highly recommend. I'm a recent college grad who opted to not get cable and this has been awesome. DEFINITELYYYYYYYY recommend getting Amazon Prime so that you can enjoy the great shows that they have to offer (I LOVE TRANSPARENT!) on your Fire TV Stick. Amazon Prime is the best decision I've made- well, ever. I've been really happy with my Fire TV Stick and Amazon Prime since I got it two weeks ago!
author: Kaitlyn
